00252 class HumanHand : public Hand {
00253         Q_OBJECT
00254 private:
00255         std::vector<Tendon *> tendonVec;
00256         std::vector<TendonWrapper *> tendonWrapperVec;
00258         void applyTendonForces();
00259 public:
00260         HumanHand(World*,const char*);
00261         int nrTendons;
00262         int nrTendonWrappers;
00263         virtual int loadFromXml(const TiXmlElement* root,QString rootPath);
00264         void updateTendonGeometry();
00265         int getNumTendons(){return nrTendons;}
00266         Tendon* getTendon(int i){return tendonVec[i];}
00267         TendonWrapper* getTendonWrapper(int i){return tendonWrapperVec[i];}
00268         void selectTendon(int i){tendonVec[i]->select();}
00269         void deselectTendon(int i){tendonVec[i]->deselect();}
00271         virtual void DOFController(double timeStep);
00272 };
